member.name: M:FixedMath.FixedVector2.DistSqPointLineSegment(FixedMath.FixedVector2,FixedMath.FixedVector2,FixedMath.FixedVector2)
member.summary: Computes the squared distance from a line segment with the specified endpoints to a specified point.
member.param: The first endpoint of the line segment.
The second endpoint of the line segment.
The point to which the squared distance is to be calculated.
member.returns: The squared distance from the line segment to the point.
